mappings.expression: "Hi dear " + @{payload.name} + ", Your email is " + @{payload.email} + ", your country is " + @{payload.country} + ", and you were born on " + @{payload.birth_year} + ". " + @{payload.nudge_msg} + " " + @{payload.metrics_msg} + "  Best regards, Badflix"
